name: Real Taxi Offroad
description:
Race your car through the big city traffic, pick up passengers and drive them safely to their destinations. Get in your taxi, fasten your seat belts and become a city traffic racer.

GAME FEATURES:
- This exciting and dynamic game is sure to bring you hours of fun.
- Many different routes across the city.
- Realistic City visuals.
- Extremely precise driving simulator.
